DOC.brief_summary: To provide early access tipranavir evaluate safety tolerance tipranavir combine low dose ritonavir patient progressive , HIV-1 disease fail intolerant currently approve treatment HIV infection , unable participate another tipranavir control clinical trial urgent need anti-HIV treatment .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients aho positive serology HIV antibody test confirm Western blot , p24 antigen assay , HIV1 RNA HIV culture highly pretreated virus resistant multiple protease inhibitor .
